contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|Bogart|bogart}} '''[[Humphrey Bogart]]''' (1899â€“1957) was an American actor. '''Bogart''' may also refer to: ==People== * [[Bogart (surname)]] * "Bogart", nickname of ''American Idol'' contestant [[Bo Bice]] ==Places== * [[Bogart, Georgia]] * [[Bogart, Ohio]], an unincorporated community * [[Bogart, Ontario]], a settlement * [[Bogart's]], a Cincinnati, Ohio, music venue ==Other uses== * [[Boggart]] or bogart, a creature in Celtic mythology * A variant of the [[fedora (hat)]] * "Bogart", a song by [[Nik Kershaw]] * [[Humphrey Bogart#In popular culture|bogart]], keep a marijuana cigarette for an unfairly long time while others are waiting; 1968 "Don't Bogart Me" ("Don't bogart that joint, my friend, pass it over to me") by [[Fraternity of Man]] in ''Easy Rider'' film soundtrack ==See also== * [[Boggart (Harry Potter)]], a shape-shifting creature in the Harry Potter book series {{Disambiguation}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bogart (Disambiguation)}}
